mapper.select: select id,title,content,pub_time publishTime,blog_id blogId from tb_post where id = #{id}
select id,title,content,pub_time publishTime,blog_id blogId from tb_post where blog_id = #{blogId}
select id,title,content,pub_time publishTime,blog_id blogId from tb_post
select p.id,p.title,p.pub_time publishTime,u.user_name userName,b.path blogPath from tb_post p inner join tb_blog b on p.blog_id = b.id inner join tb_user u on b.user_id = u.id

select p.id,p.title,p.pub_time publishTime,u.user_name userName,b.path blogPath from tb_tag t inner join tb_post_tag pt on t.id = pt.tag_id inner join tb_post p on pt.post_id = p.id inner join tb_blog b on p.blog_id = b.id inner join tb_user u on b.user_id = u.id where t.name = #{name}
